oracle.adf.view.rich.export

Class ExportContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.adf.view.rich.export.ExportContext

  • public class ExportContext
extends Object
    The ExportContext holds context information about the current export action.

        public boolean isSpanned()
        Checks whether the current cell being exported is spanned or not, either by cell before it (colSpan) or above it (rowSpan).
        Returns:
        retunrs true if the current cell being exported is a spanned.

        Parameters:
        isSpanned - the boolean to set if the current cell is spanned
